metadata.title: CVE-2015-8004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.23.11, 1.24.x before 1.24.4, and 1.25.x before 1.25.3does not properly restrict access to revisions, which allows remoteauthenticated users with the viewsuppressed user right to remove revisionsuppressions via a crafted revisiondelete action, which returns a valid achange form.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
